channel.title: Software on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: OGIF - Oh God It's Friday
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: OGIF, or ‘Oh God It’s Friday,’ is our team’s weekly technical deep-dive. It’s a dedicated time for engineers to present complex problems, discuss potential solutions, and explore emerging technologies relevant to our work.

item.title: How to work with clients
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TRAINING COURSE: HOW TO WORK WITH CLIENT What skills that an engineer should have in order to work with client effectively?

item.title: Life At Dwarves Software Design Group
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The idea: A path to better software “Everything in software architecture is a trade-off, and the why is more important than how.

item.title: OGIF - Oh God It's Friday
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: I would like to introduce to you our new initiative called OGIF — Oh God It’s Friday. Moving forward, our Friday Showcase will have a broader range of topics to discuss and share.

item.title: Focus On Software Delivery
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Focus on shipping when you are struggling with what to do next to be better as a software engineer. When you ship something new, users will try out your build and give you feedback.

item.title: Road To 100
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: 2022 matched us with the 80th Dwarves. A notable highlight, and we’re ready to have more. It’s not easy to find people that has the same value.

item.title: Life At Dwarves With Hieu Vu
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Life at Dwarves #6 is all about how Hieu Vu picked up Golang as his favorite programming, and how human factor happens to be the key element that ties him with Dwarves.

item.title: Life At Dwarves With Nam Nguyen
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: “The process of transformation and progress will never be easy, but you need it for a better version”. Life at Dwarves #5 is the career story of Nam, the Dwarves’s DevOps Engineer.

item.title: Life At Dwarves With Tom Nguyen
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A catch-up with Tom - our Data Lead, and hear how remote working has fit him perfectly. Tom is one of our core contributors of Dwarves Brainery, and he’ll be playing as a key mentor for our upcoming Apprenticeship.

item.title: Life At Dwarves With Thanh Pham
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Been with us for nearly 5 years, Thanh has been taking care of the juniors and ensuring their progress goes alongside the company’s direction.
